definition: to give a false appearance of being, possessing, or performing
examples: does not pretend to be a psychiatrist

definition: to claim, represent, or assert falsely
examples: pretending an emotion he could not really feel

definition: to feign an action, part, or role especially in play

examples: cannot pretend to any particular expertise
had a pretend pal with whom he talked
a pretend train for the children to play in
